nodes.text: Mace Windu's Delta-7B Aethersprite-class light interceptor

This Delta-7B Aethersprite-class light interceptor was used by Jedi Master Mace Windu during the Clone Wars. R8-B7 was the astromech droid assigned to Windu and the fighter. When R8-B7 was destroyed, R2-D2 commandeered the ship.
